#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	string ex;
	cin>>ex;
	string tor;
	for(int i=0;i<ex.size();i++)
	{
		if(ex[i]<='W')
		{
			char ch = ex[i]+3;
			tor+=ch;
		}
		else
		{
			if(ex[i]=='X')
			{
				char ch = 'A';
				tor+=ch;
			}
			if(ex[i]=='Y')
			{
				char ch = 'B';
				tor+=ch;
			}
			if(ex[i]=='Z')
			{
				char ch = 'C';
				tor+=ch;
			}
		}
	}
	cout<<tor;
}
